message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $13,000. Would you be willing to consider $11,500?
